text: Michael Cleere (born 10 November 1960) is an Irish retired hurler who played for Kilkenny Championship club O'Loughlin Gaels. He played for the Kilkenny senior hurling team for a brief period, during which time he usually lined out as a forward. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:O'Loughlin Gaels hurlers Category:Kilkenny inter-county hurlers
title: Michael Cleere
